name: StalkerCraft (ivancraftGame)
description:
StalkerCraft is Minecraft, only with modified textures, the goal of the game is to survive in the world of radiation. You can create worlds like Survival and Creative Mode.

In the Survival mode, you will survive in the world, create a home for yourself, fight with mobs, etc.

And in the Creative mode, you can do whatever you want, you will have eternal health, all the blocks, etc.
